publications.title: Distally-referred surface electrical nerve stimulation (DR-SENS) for haptic feedback
publications.note: Characterizes DR-SENS electrode placement and perceived sensation location.

publications.title: Design and Evaluation of a Low-profile Haptic Interface Based on Surface Electrical Nerve Stimulation
publications.note: Wearable stimulation interface compatible with optical hand tracking.

publications.title: An Operator-centric Design of an Avatar System using Digital Nerve Stimulation
publications.note: System architecture and human interface for immersive teleoperation.
